cancelEnrolmentModal.title: Are you sure you want to cancel the registration?

cancelledPage.text: You have canceled your registration for our event {{name}}.
cancelledPage.title: Your registration has been canceled

completedPage.redirectInfo1: You will be automatically redirected to the service provider's page.
completedPage.redirectInfo2: If the redirect does not work, you can access the page here.
completedPage.text: You have signed up to our event {{name}} - welcome!
completedPage.title: Thank you for signing up!

deleteParticipantModal.text1: Are you sure you want to delete the participant? Participant's reservations will also be removed.
deleteParticipantModal.text1_other: Are you sure you want to delete participants? Participants' reservations will also be removed.
deleteParticipantModal.title: Confirm deleting participant

inWaitingList.tooltip: Entrants have been added to the queue of registrants with a reserve place. Registration is confirmed only when a place in the queue becomes available. You will receive a notification by e-mail that the place has been confirmed.

labelAccepted: I agree to share my information with the organizer. We do not use the information you provide for marketing purposes. Privacy policy

personsAddedToWaitingListModal.text: Please note that not all registrants' places are guaranteed. Entrants in the reserve position will only be confirmed if more places become available in the queue. You will receive a separate email from confirmed registration.
personsAddedToWaitingListModal.title: Entrants have been added to the reservation queue

placeholderAttendeeExtraInfo: Enter any additional information or request
placeholderExtraInfo: Enter any additional information or request
placeholderName: Enter the registrant's first and last name

warnings.capacityInWaitingList: Registration for this event is still possible, but there are only {{count}} seat left in the queue.
warnings.capacityInWaitingList_other: Registration for this event is still possible, but there are only {{count}} seats left in the queue.
warnings.closed: Registration for this event is currently closed. Please try again later.
